attributes.action: It's discriminating against under 25yr old not to get the miminmum wage!
attributes.additional_details:
Government ruling
Over 25s to get minimum wage.
attributes.background: To make it that no mater what age anyone is they should not get less than the minimum wage, not just the over 25yr old. Many youngsters have to look after themselves as they don't live with their parents. its discriminating against younger people when others over 25 do the same job and get paid more
